printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, add this operation to an agenda in the Corp's score area as a hosted condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."
stripped_printed_text: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, add this operation to an agenda in the Corp's score area as a hosted condition counter with "Host agenda is worth 1 less agenda point. When the Corp purges virus counters, trash this counter."

flavor: "Credits spend anywhere in the worlds, but there are other forms of currency."
printed_text: Once per turn, you may jack out when you encounter a sentry.
stripped_printed_text: Once per turn, you may jack out when you encounter a sentry.

flavor: "I'm on a need-to-know basis. I need to know everything." -Nero Severn
printed_text: +1[mu] +1[link] Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu +1 link Whenever you jack out, the Corp reveals 1 card from HQ at random. Limit 1 console per player.

printed_text:
[click]: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed.
[trash]: Look at the top card of R&D.
Limit 6 per deck.
stripped_printed_text: click: Look at the top X cards of your stack and arrange them in any order. X is the number of copies of Spy Camera installed. trash: Look at the top card of R&D. Limit 6 per deck.

flavor: Leverage, secrets, access, and influence are currency as valuable as credits. But credits work, too.
printed_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. [trash], X[credit]: Trash 1 rezzed card with trash cost equal to X.
stripped_printed_text: Install only if you made a successful run on HQ this turn. trash, X credits: Trash 1 rezzed card with trash cost equal to X.

printed_text: Interface â†’ 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 3 or more subtypes. 1[credit]: +1 strength. 2[credit]: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a piece of ice with 3 or more subtypes. 1 credit: +1 strength. 2 credits: Swap this program with a deva program from your grip.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. When you steal an agenda, add "Freedom Through Equality" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

flavor: "Our shared humanity is our greatest strength. And as we share more broadly, our strength grows, not dwindles."
printed_text: Each player has 1 additional [click] to spend during his or her turn.
stripped_printed_text: Each player has 1 additional click to spend during his or her turn.

flavor: "Bureaucracy and red tape have been weaponized." -Fake-ir
printed_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Corp rezzes an asset or upgrade, you may pay credits equal to its rez cost and trash Councilman. If you do, derez that asset or upgrade. The Corp cannot rez it for the remainder of this turn.

printed_text:
Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it.
When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses [click], if able.
stripped_printed_text: Place 3 agenda counters on Voting Machine Initiative when you score it. When the Runner's turn begins, you may spend 1 hosted agenda counter. If you do, the Runner loses click, if able.

flavor: "Our research says the public views clones as more human than bioroids. Historically, this has been a liability. Let's make it a strength."
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may add 1 operation from Archives to HQ if there is no ice protecting this server.

flavor: "There's no conflict of interest here. These are complex issues with highly technical minutiae. It's only natural that the experts should lay down the guidelines."
printed_text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, do 1 net damage if there is no ice protecting this server.

flavor: "Politics is a dirty business. But so is business." -Krishnan Sareen
printed_text: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you draw an agenda, you may reveal and install it.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When you score an agenda, add "Clones are not People" to your score area as an agenda worth 1 agenda point.

flavor: Being a Mumbad sensie star means a glamorous life, though it is lived in constant fear of blackmail-or worse-from orgcrime.
printed_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, you may draw 3 cards if there is no ice protecting this server. If you do, add 1 card from HQ to the bottom of R&D.

flavor: "Money is speech and I am listening intently." -Krishnan Sareen
printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 3[credit] if there is no ice protecting this server.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, gain 3 credits if there is no ice protecting this server.

flavor: Mumbad's public city corporation is tightly connected to all the other corporations.
printed_text: [click]: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: click: Search R&D for an alliance card, reveal it, and play or install it (paying all costs). Shuffle R&D.

flavor: Efficiency means profiting from things everyone was doing anyway.
printed_text:
Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1[credit].
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner breaks a subroutine on Bailiff, gain 1 credit. Subroutine End the run.

printed_text: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2[credit] less. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you rez another card in the root of or protecting this server, you may rez 1 card, paying 2 credits less. Limit 1 region per server.
